text: Arau arasye ami tomara purbe bahuto raachula praerana karaicho. Ami te'omlokara kichumanara barnana tomara ocarata karaicho arau kichumanara barnana karaa na'i. Allahara anumati bine kono nirdesa lai aha kono raachulara pakse sambhara nahaya. Eteke yetiya allahara adesa ahiba tetiya n'yaya sangatabharae phayacala hai yaba. Tetiya batilapanthi bilaka ksatigrasta haâ€™ba
